title: Stage Lv8-C2-S13
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The solution is considerably more effective than the previous one.
This approach is substantially better than what we tried before.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 이 해결책은 이전 것보다 상당히 더 효과적입니다.
sentences.en: The solution is considerably more effective than the previous one.

sentences.kr: 이 접근법은 우리가 전에 시도했던 것보다 실질적으로 더 낫습니다.
sentences.en: This approach is substantially better than what we tried before.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 우리의 기대를 훨씬 뛰어넘어 놀랍도록 잘 해냈습니다.
sentences.en: She performed remarkably well, far exceeding our expectations.

sentences.kr: 새로운 시스템은 현저하게 더 빠르고 안정적입니다.
sentences.en: The new system is significantly faster and more reliable.

sentences.kr: 그의 발표는 예상보다 훨씬 더 인상적이었습니다.
sentences.en: His presentation was far more impressive than anticipated.

sentences.kr: 이 방법은 기존 방법보다 현저히 더 정확합니다.
sentences.en: This method is markedly more accurate than the existing one.

sentences.kr: 결과는 우리가 예상했던 것보다 월등히 더 좋았습니다.
sentences.en: The results were vastly better than what we had expected.

sentences.kr: 이 제품은 경쟁 제품보다 압도적으로 더 우수합니다.
sentences.en: This product is overwhelmingly superior to the competition.
